snippet: Politicking in Uttar Pradesh, he talks tough and wears a beard.
abstract: Politicking in Uttar Pradesh, he talks tough and wears a beard.
lead_paragraph: Rahul Gandhi gave a news conference on Monday, wearing a bristly beard and voicing what amounted to a political growl. His appearance came as voting was scheduled to begin in Uttar Pradesh state on Wednesday. Mr. Gandhi, who has staked his political credibility on the race, wanted to send a clear signal of where his ambitions lie.
